programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Paul Walker and Vin Diesel. When illegal street racer Dominic Toretto is suspected of being the mastermind behind a series of truck hijacks, undercover police officer Brian O'Conner is sent to infiltrate his gang. But O'Conner's judgement becomes clouded when he falls in love with Toretto's sister, Mia Rob Cohen - Director Paul Walker - Brian Earl Spilner / Officer Brian O'Conner Vin Diesel - Dominic Toretto Michelle Rodriguez - Letty Jordana Brewster - Mia Toretto Rick Yune - Johnny Tran Chad Lindberg - Jesse Johnny Strong - Leon Ted Levine - Sgt Tanner Matt Schulze - Vince.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-June 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Comedy adventure starring Rowan Atkinson, and featuring John Malkovich. When the crown jewels are stolen from under the nose of the authorities, bumbling secret agent Johnny English is assigned to retrieve them and capture the culprits. The unfortunate spy is soon in over his head when he discovers that the theft is part of an evil plan to seize the British throne Peter Howitt - Director Rowan Atkinson - Johnny English Natalie Imbruglia - Lorna Campbell Ben Miller - Bough John Malkovich - Pascal Sauvage Tim Pigott-Smith - Pegasus Kevin McNally - Prime Minister Oliver Ford Davies - Archbishop of Canterbury Douglas McFerran - Carlos Vendetta Steve Nicolson - Dieter Klein Greg Wise - Agent One.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.sub-title: Musical, Drama, Crime/detective, Music, Comedy, Arts And Culture ║ 2002 ║ 12
programme.desc: Oscar-winning musical starring Catherine Zeta-Jones, Renée Zellweger and Richard Gere. In 1920s Chicago, chorus girl Roxie Hart shoots her lover and winds up in jail, believing her dreams of stardom are over. Enter hotshot lawyer Billy Flynn, whose clients include double murderess Velma Kelly, and Roxie begins to realise that there's no such thing as bad publicity Rob Marshall - Director Catherine Zeta-Jones - Velma Kelly Renée Zellweger - Roxie Hart Richard Gere - Billy Flynn Queen Latifah - Matron \Mama\ Morton Christine Baranski - Mary Sunshine John C Reilly - Amos Hart Taye Diggs - The Band Leader Dominic West - Fred Casely Lucy Liu - Go-to-Hell Kitty Colm Feore - Martin Harrison Mya - Mona Chita Rivera - The Judge.

programme.title: Anyone But You
programme.desc: Bea and Ben enjoy an incredible first date, but attraction quickly burns out and they are delighted to be apart. However, fate compels the duo to reconsider, and they seize the opportunity to attend a lavish wedding in Australia, as a couple. The pair pretend to be deliriously in love during the once-in-a-lifetime trip and keep up appearances in front of other guests. Director Will Gluck's romantic comedy based on Shakespeare's Much Ado About Nothing, starring Sydney Sweeney and Glen Powell Will Gluck - Director Sydney Sweeney - Bea Glen Powell - Ben Alexandra Shipp - Claudia Rachel Griffiths - Innie Dermot Mulroney - Leo Darren Barnet - Jonathan Michelle Hurd - Carol Hadley Robinson - Halle.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: On holiday in Europe, American couple Ben and Louise Dalton and their anxiety-crippled daughter Agnes meet English doctor Patrick Feld, his wife Ciara and their young son Ant, who was born without a tongue. The Daltons' vacation soon turns into a nightmare when they are invited to stay on the Felds' country estate. Horror, starring James McAvoy, Mackenzie Davis, Scoot McNairy and Aisling Franciosi James Watkins - Director James McAvoy - Paddy Field Mackenzie Davis - Louise Dalton Scoot McNairy - Ben Dalton Aisling Franciosi - Ciara Field Alix West Lefler - Agnes Dalton Dan Hough - Ant Kris Hitchen - Mike.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: Francis Ford Coppola's epic crime drama, starring Marlon Brando, Al Pacino and James Caan. In New York following the Second World War, Don Corleone is determined that his family should keep control of the American crime world. His daughter Connie is to be married, an occasion that draws guests pledging gifts to the couple in the hope that they will be granted favours by the "Godfather" Francis Ford Coppola - Director Marlon Brando - Don Vito Corleone Al Pacino - Michael Corleone James Caan - Sonny Corleone Richard Castellano - Clemenza Robert Duvall - Tom Hagen Sterling Hayden - McCluskey John Marley - Jack Woltz Richard Conte - Barzini Diane Keaton - Kay Adams Al Lettieri - Sollozzo Abe Vigoda - Tessio Talia Shire - Connie Rizzi Gianni Russo - Carlo Rizzi John Cazale - Fredo Corleone Rudy Bond - Cuneo Al Martino - Johnny Fontane Morgana King - Mama Corleone Lenny Montana - Luca Brasi John Martino - Paulie Gatto Salvatore Corsitto - Bonasera Richard Bright - Neri Alex Rocco - Moe Greene Vito Scotti - Nazorine Simonetta Stefanelli - Apollonia Vitelli Corleone Corrado Gaipa - Don Tommasino Franco Citti - Calo.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II
programme.desc: Epic crime drama starring Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall and Diane Keaton. Michael Corleone is determined to legitimise the family business, but struggles to escape its violent past. programme.title: The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone
programme.desc: Francis Ford Coppola's finale to The Godfather saga, starring Al Pacino, Diane Keaton and Andy Garcia. New York, 1979: Michael Corleone wants out of his criminal empire in a search for respectability. But it's difficult to break with the family tradition. Inevitably, the tentacles of the old business prove all-embracing and powerful, with fatal consequences Francis Ford Coppola - Director Al Pacino - Michael Corleone Diane Keaton - Kay Adams Andy Garcia - Vincent Mancini Talia Shire - Connie Corleone Rizzi Eli Wallach - Don Altobello Joe Mantegna - Joey Zasa George Hamilton - BJ Harrison Bridget Fonda - Grace Hamilton Sofia Coppola - Mary Corleone Raf Vallone - Cardinal Lamberto Franc D'Ambrosio - Anthony Corleone Donal Donnelly - Archbishop Gilday Richard Bright - Al Neri Helmut Berger - Frederick Keinzig Don Novello - Dominic Abbandando John Savage - Andrew Hagen Franco Citti - Calo Mario Donatone - Mosca Vittorio Duse - Don Tommasino Enzo Robutti - Licio Lucchesi Michele Russo - Spara Al Martino - Johnny Fontane Robert Cicchini - Lou Pennino Robert Vento - Father John Willie Brown - Party politician Jeannie Linero - Lucy Mancini Remo Remotti - Camerlengo cardinal Jeanne Savarino Pesch - Francesca Corleone Janet Savarino Smith - Kathryn Corleone Tere L Baker - Teresa Hagen Carmine Caridi - Albert Volpe Don Costello (2) - Frank Romano Al Ruscio - Leo Cune Mickey Knox - Matty Parisi.

programme.title: Goodfellas
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese's crime drama, starring Robert De Niro, Ray Liotta and Joe Pesci. In 1950s New York, Irish-Italian schoolboy Henry Hill dreams of becoming a gangster and lands a job parking cars for the Mob. Having earned the respect of the local Mafia boss, he is teamed with hitmen James Conway and Tommy DeVito. But as the years pass, Hill finds his allegiance to the Mob challenged as he descends deeper into organised crime Martin Scorsese - Director Robert De Niro - James Conway Ray Liotta - Henry Hill Joe Pesci - Tommy DeVito Lorraine Bracco - Karen Hill Paul Sorvino - Paul Cicero Frank Sivero - Frankie Carbone Tony Darrow - Sonny Bunz Mike Starr - Frenchy Frank Vincent - Billy Batts Chuck Low - Morris Kessler Catherine Scorsese - Tommy's mother Frank DiLeo - Tuddy Cicero Henny Youngman - Henny Youngman Gina Mastrogiacomo - Janice Rossi Charles Scorsese - Vinnie Suzanne Shepherd - Karen's mother Debi Mazar - Sandy Samuel L Jackson - Stacks Michael Imperioli - Spider.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Action adventure starring Harrison Ford and Karen Allen. Indiana Jones's outrageous exploits take him around the world in search of the legendary Ark of the Covenant, a religious artefact of unspeakable power wanted by the Nazis. programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Harrison Ford returns as intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones in the second entry in Steven Spielberg's action adventure series. On the trail of fortune and glory in Shanghai, Indy is launched on a dangerous new quest that takes him to India via the Himalayas. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indy goes in search of the magical Sankara stone and uncovers an ancient evil that threatens all who come into contact with it Steven Spielberg - Director Harrison Ford - Indiana Jones Kate Capshaw - Willie Scott Ke Huy Quan - Short Round Amrish Puri - Mola Ram Roshan Seth - Chatter Lal Philip Stone - Captain Blumburtt Roy Chiao - Lao Che David Yip - Wu Han Ric Young - Kao Kan Chua Kah Joo - Chen Rex Ngui - Maître d Philip Tann - Chief henchman Dan Aykroyd - Weber Pat Roach - Chief guard.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Period action adventure starring Harrison Ford, Ray Winstone, Cate Blanchett and Shia LaBeouf. Nevada in the late 1950s: intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones finds himself up to his neck in trouble again when he encounters Irina Spalko and a gang of Soviet agents at a military base in the desert. However, this is only the start of a series of adventures that will take Indy deep into the Amazon jungle in search of a mysterious crystal skull Steven Spielberg - Director Harrison Ford - Indiana Jones Cate Blanchett - Irina Spalko Ray Winstone - George \Mac\ McHale Shia LaBeouf - Mutt Williams John Hurt - Professor \Ox\ Oxley Karen Allen - Marion Ravenwood Jim Broadbent - Dean Charles Stanforth Igor Jijikine - Dovchenko Alan Dale (2) - General Ross Andrew Divoff - Russian soldier.

programme.title: Interstellar

programme.title: Look Who's Talking
programme.desc: Comedy with John Travolta and Kirstie Alley. Mollie is an accountant who has an affair with a married client and becomes pregnant. programme.title: Barbie
programme.desc: Satirical fantasy comedy starring Margot Robbie and Ryan Gosling. When blonde and bubbly Barbie experiences a series of sudden crises, she must leave Barbieland to track down her human owner and make things right. But the adoring Ken follows her to Los Angeles where he discovers something called the "patriarchy" and develops some radical ideas.. programme.title: The Hurricane Heist

He is alarmed when Angela and her friend Katherine vanish in the woods and return three days later with no memory of their ordeal. A shocking chain of events convinces Victor that his daughter's soul is at stake and he calls upon Chris MacNeil to help him confront an ancient evil. programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock and symbiote partner-in-crime Venom are lying low in Mexico City, on the run for the apparent murder of detective Patrick Mulligan. Knull, the symbiotes' immortal creator, dispatches hunters to locate Venom's hidden power source, the Codex, which can set Knull free to terrorise the multiverse. programme.title: Frost/Nixon
programme.desc: Historical drama starring Frank Langella and Michael Sheen. For three years after leaving the White House in disgrace following the Watergate scandal, former US President Richard Nixon has remained silent on the matter. So when talk-show host David Frost persuades Nixon to agree to a series of televised interviews, it is the perfect opportunity for the British TV star to make a name for himself. programme.title: One Life

In 1938, young British stockbroker Nicholas Winton visits Prague and becomes involved in an audacious plan to evacuate hundreds of Jewish children before the Nazis close the borders. For three years after leaving the White House in disgrace following the Watergate scandal, former US President Richard Nixon has remained silent on the matter. programme.title: PL Greatest Games:M City/L'Pool 13
programme.desc: Relive a Premier League classic, as Man City face Liverpool back in 2013. City needed three points to close the gap at the top to Man Utd, while the Reds were chasing a top four spot.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Man U/L'Pool '95
programme.desc: A look back at some classic matches in the Premier League. Here, Man United host Liverpool in October 1995, as Eric Cantona returned from his lengthy suspension in a thrilling 2-2 draw.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:L'Pool/Man U '97
programme.desc: A look back at some classic matches in the Premier League. Here, Liverpool meet Manchester United at Anfield in 1997, in a match that had a happy outcome for the Red Devils.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:L'Pool/Man U '01
programme.desc: A look back at some classic matches in the Premier League. Here, Liverpool meet Manchester United in 2001, as a Michael Owen brace guided the home side to victory.

programme.title: Best Premier League Goals 12/13
programme.desc: Enjoy some of the best Premier League goals from years gone by. Here, the finest strikes from the 2012-2013 season, in which Man Utd won the title in Sir Alex's final year in charge.

programme.title: PL 100 Club: Sergio Aguero
programme.desc: A celebration of the players to have bagged 100 goals or more in the Premier League. Here, a look at Sergio Aguero, who has scored over 100 times during his time at Manchester City.

programme.desc: Enjoy some of the best goals from past clashes between Chelsea and Manchester United in the Premier League.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Man U/L'Pool '10
programme.desc: A look back at some classic matches in the Premier League. Here, Manchester United meet Liverpool in 2010, with a Dimitar Berbatov hat-trick proving the difference between the two teams.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Man U/L'Pool '14
programme.desc: A look back at some classic matches in the Premier League. Here, Man United host Liverpool in March 2014 in a remarkable contest that saw the visitors awarded three penalties.

programme.title: PL Greatest : Chelsea/Man Utd 2012
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, rewind to 2012 for a memorable, ill-tempered clash between high-flying Chelsea and Man Utd at Stamford Bridge.

programme.title: PL Greatest : Man Utd/Chelsea 2014
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, rewind to 2014 for a pulsating encounter between Manchester United and Chelsea at Old Trafford.

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25
programme.desc: Arne Slot's managerial credentials are put to the test again as a well-oiled Andoni Iraola outfit arrives to face Liverpool. Bournemouth fell agonisingly short to Chelsea last week. (21.09).

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25
programme.desc: Liverpool and Brighton meet again, this time in the Premier League after their midweek Carabao Cup clash. Arne Slot's Reds are looking to maintain the pace at the top. (02.11).

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25
programme.desc: A tough test awaits for Arne Slot's Reds at Anfield as Marco Silva's in-form Fulham arrive for this Premier League clash. Liverpool's trip to Goodison was postponed last week. (14.12).

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25
programme.desc: Six points clear of second-placed Arsenal, Arne Slot's Liverpool host Ipswich. A late Darwin Nunez double at Brentford saw the Reds claim their first Premier League win of 2025. (25.01).

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25
programme.desc: Two weeks on from a memorable 3-0 win at Old Trafford, Arne Slot and co reconvene at Anfield as Forest provide this week's Premier League opposition to unbeaten Liverpool. (14.09).

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25
programme.desc: The Reds return to Anfield after their midweek travels as the focus turns to the Premier League title. Liverpool's opponents Southampton have lost their last three and sit bottom. (08.03).

programme.title: Premier League Years 14/15
programme.desc: Enjoy a look back at all of the most memorable moments from the 2014-2015 Premier League campaign. The relegation battle went down to the final day of the season.

programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, title-chasing Arsenal travel to Wigan Athletic in 2010 for a game with a remarkable final ten minutes.

programme.desc: A celebration of the players to have bagged 100 goals or more in the Premier League. This episode features the best goals of Everton and Manchester United's Wayne Rooney.

programme.title: Premier League Icons: Luis Suarez
programme.desc: A look at some of the most iconic players to have graced the Premier League. Here, the focus is on former Liverpool forward Luis Suarez - a highly skilled player not shy of controversy.

programme.title: PL Icons: Ruud Van Nistelrooy
programme.desc: A look at some of the most iconic players to have graced the Premier League. Here, the focus is on former Man Utd forward Ruud van Nistelrooy - a prolific goalscorer in his prime.

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25
programme.desc: At the Etihad, Thomas Frank's Brentford challenge the champions Manchester City in their own backyard. Pep Guardiola's men have made the perfect start to their title defence. (14.09).

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25
programme.desc: In-form Brighton pay a Premier League visit to the fifth-placed champions Manchester City. Just a point separates the two teams, with Fabian Hurzeler's Seagulls sat in seventh. (15.03).

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25
programme.desc: Back at the Etihad after consecutive Premier League draws, Pep Guardiola and co target three points as Marco Silva's Fulham, who sit sixth in the table, pay a visit. (05.10).

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25

programme.desc: Day two of the 2025 ICC World Test Championship final between Australia and South Africa at Lord's. (12.06).

programme.title: EFL 21/22: Blackburn v Fulham
programme.desc: In a Sky Bet Championship encounter to remember for the visitors - and one to forget for the hosts - the travelling Fulham put seven unanswered goals past a hapless Blackburn at Ewood Park.

programme.title: EFL Play-Off Memories: 1999
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic play-off final from the English Football League. Here, rewind to 1999 and a memorable encounter between Gillingham and Manchester City.

programme.desc: Action from the UEFA Champions League as Brian Priske's Feyenoord meet Sparta Prague at De Kuip. Feyenoord are winless in their four games against Sparta Prague.

programme.desc: UEFA Champions League action as Atletico Madrid face Bayer Leverkusen at Riyadh Air Metropolitano. A win for Atletico would see them leapfrog Leverkusen in the table.

programme.desc: Action from the final of the Roland-Garros Mixed Doubles, as Americans Taylor Townsend and Evan King take on Italian pair Sara Errani and Andrea Vavassori.

programme.desc: Action from the Roland-Garros Women's Doubles final, as Italian pair Jasmine Paolini and Sara Errani take on Aleksandra Krunic and Anna Danilina.

programme.desc: UEFA Champions League action as Juventus face Benfica at Allianz Stadium. Juve have lost six of their eight previous meetings with Benfica in European competition.

programme.desc: Action from the UEFA Champions League as Lille meet Dutch side Feyenoord at Stade Pierre-Mauroy. Both sides are still in the hunt for a top-eight finish.

programme.desc: Action from the crucial UEFA Champions League clash between Aston Villa and Celtic at Villa Park. A win for Unai Emery's Villans could see them secure a top-eight finish.

programme.desc: Action from the UEFA Champions League as Spanish side Girona welcome Arsenal to Estadi Montilivi. Mikel Arteta's Gunners are looking to make it six wins out of eight in the UCL.
